titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that remarriage of the surviving spouse of a veteran after age sixty shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Provides that remarriage of a veteran's surviving spouse after age 60 shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.
